title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the SoftwareArchitectureSimulator, including the target audience, key features, desired outcomes, and any constraints or assumptions. Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project goals and expectations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the main components, their interactions, and the technology stack. Consider the following aspects: modular design, scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Provide detailed documentation and diagrams to facilitate understanding and future development.

title: Plan User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the simulation platform, considering usability, accessibility, and intuitive navigation.

title: Develop Simulation Engine
description: Implement the core simulation engine that models software architecture decisions and their long-term impacts.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for storing and retrieving simulation data, user data, and other project-related information.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Automation
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, and implement test automation.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Identify and implement security measures to protect user data, prevent unauthorized access, and ensure the overall security of the application.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance guides, to support the application's use and future development.
